All Variables:  Full Model
```{r}

train_control<- trainControl(method = 'cv', number = 10)

nb1<-train(n ~ Year+Hour+wday+pick+Temp+precip+
             broncos+rockies+nuggets,
           data = quant,
           trControl = train_control,
           method = 'glm.nb')
print(nb1)
```
Model with selected variables:

```{r}
nb2<-train(n ~ Year+hr_index+pick+M_Th+Fri+
             Temp+precip+
             broncos+rockies+nuggets,
           data = quant,
           trControl = train_control,
           method = 'glm.nb')
print(nb2)
```
Base Model: calls and hour index only
```{r}
nb3<-train(n ~ hr_index,
           data = quant,
           trControl = train_control,
           method = 'glm.nb')
print(nb3)
